verb.description: Alight from a horse, bicycle, or other thing that one is riding.

examples: we have to dismount the pump

noun.description: A move in which a gymnast jumps off an apparatus or completes a floor exercise.
examples: on the uneven bars the women go for ever more complex dismounts

origin: Mid 16th century: from dis- + mount, probably on the pattern of Old French desmonter, medieval Latin dismontare.
